## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4d0c415815934e3c66b707f8613100479590a1afe4a29fc46c607999157536e2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nvkvictim-poc' @ 0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
